channel.title: Invision's needing developers
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Invision's[/size] Development Team: Invision-X - Server developer/client developer Kirikugi - Client model maker
green = started/complete yellow = started not finish red = havent start on it Features: Storyline base: the hunger games invision's past king arthur's legend recarnation of king Arthur flawless switching custom nazi minigame custom frost dragon minigame 100 percent bork endless pking loyalty titles skilling quest more unique presentation (coming soon) going to be more custom minigames with the new items
few pics
[IMG]http://i1244.photobucket.com/albums/gg572/tehbignobody/starter.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1244.photobucket.com/albums/gg572/tehbignobody/rottenpo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1244.photobucket.com/albums/gg572/tehbignobody/nex.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1244.photobucket.com/albums/gg572/tehbignobody/nazi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1244.photobucket.com/albums/gg572/tehbignobody/item.png[/img]
currently needing server developer 1/3 client developer 0/2 gfx 0/2 website designer 0/2 hoster 1/2 model designer 1/2
app for anyy of the following position
name: why should we choose you: previous work: java scale (1-10): skype: Update: started on the storyline added in a custom minigame added in the avatar brothers auto caster

item.title: Invision's needing developers
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

InvisionX:

[quote]Well, this is quite unique, I haven’t seen ANY of this so far unless some of these features were tutorials from R-S or something. I’ll be following as I haven’t seen something like this so far. Good luck with the development!

ty and im going to probary delete the current items and add some custom and probary some custom areas :D[/quote]

Do you know how to write sprites to the client, make sprite actions, and implement your own animations/gfx?

Read full topic

item.title: Invision's needing developers
item.dc:creator: @ParadoxTM ParadoxTM
item.description:
@ParadoxTM wrote:

This is really as everyone has been saying unique… I say keep up the good work. Your starting a whole other meaning to Runescape Private Servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Invision's needing developers
item.dc:creator: @master_roshi master roshi
item.description:
@master_roshi wrote:

name: Santino Roma
why should we choose you: ive been with 3 development teams which they failed so we all just quit but i do have basic coding experience especially with 317s-600s im applying for server dev and ingame admin i promise i am a nice and funny person and you wolnt regret choosing me
previous work: Nexon-World rsps
java scale (1-10): il be honest probably a 5
skype:santino.roma69

Read full topic
